data.title: TIME Magazine Subscription Offers
data.meta_description: TIME magazine subscription offer - 12 month and subscriptions available. Subscribe now and save over £100 a year with magazine.co.uk!
data.text:
Since 1923 TIME Magazine has been one of the most respected and informative guides to the world’s events, from health and politics to business and entertainment, and attracting close to 2 million readers. TIME covers provocative ideas and topics discussed by the nation and the world and rapidly responds to the news stories you want to hear.

With a TIME Magazine subscription you can expect to not only keep up with events but you’ll be able to anticipate them. Make sure you stay informed on the latest news stories and significant world issues today!

By signing up for a subscription to TIME Magazine you can expect the following:

• 60+ colour pages of recent global news coverage

• Ground breaking news – the latest exclusives from around the world

• Cover stories – bringing you thought provoking stories from the current world events

• Viewpoint – Sparking conversation and debate

• Tech – Keeping you up to date with the latest tech innovations

• Free delivery direct to your door

• Award winning coverage of key global issues

• Exclusive annual features, including the renouned TIME Person of the Year and the eagerly anticipated TIME 100

Barcode: 9771064030005

Issues per year: Time publishes 22 double issues, each count as 2 in a 44 issue subscription term.

Country of Publication: United Kingdom

Publisher: Time Magazine UK Ltd.

FREE Delivery on all subscriptions!

All prices for magazine subscriptions listed on magazine.co.uk include free delivery.

First issue delivery

TIME is published twice a month (except for June & August) by Time Magazine UK Ltd. Your first issue mails in 4-6 weeks. TIME will be delivered in the form of double issues, which count as two. Frequency is subject to change without notice.

To request an exact delivery date for an order, publisher contact details are provided in your order confirmation email. Further details can also be found on our Delivery page.

Instant digital access at no additional cost

Exclusive to magazine.co.uk, you'll also get instant digital access to the latest issue of this title when you subscribe. So you can enjoy the current issue digitally whilst you wait for the next issue to arrive in print!
